summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Lander Street, from Whatcom Avenue to East Waterway; all in the City of Seattle; by filling; planking and replanking the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4916, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
